summary: Auto unequip your arrows if you are no longer using any type of bow
descriptionHtml:
[size=4][color=#4E2A2A]%%[/color][color=#6B2323]%%[/color][color=#891C1C]%%[/color][color=#A61515]%%[/color][color=#C40E0E]%%[/color][color=#E10707]%%[/color][color=#FF0000]%%[/color][/size]  [size=4][color=#AFEEEE][[/color] STEAM WORKSHOP [color=#AFEEEE]][/color][/size]
[url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=9937]http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=9937[/url]

[size=4][color=#4E2A2A]%%[/color][color=#6B2323]%%[/color][color=#891C1C]%%[/color][color=#A61515]%%[/color][color=#C40E0E]%%[/color][color=#E10707]%%[/color][color=#FF0000]%%[/color][/size]  [size=4][color=#AFEEEE][[/color] VERSION HISTORY [color=#AFEEEE]][/color][/size]

[b][color=#40FF40]0.5c[/color][/b]
- Fixed the bug, boom head shot?

[b][color=#40FF40]0.5b[/color][/b]
- Hopefully fixed a bug that occurred for some people

[b][color=#40FF40]0.5a[/color][/b]
- No longer need the console to enable / disable cupid
- Now a options dialog is present, via casting a spell/power
- Default / High Stack-count as viable options of equiping your arrows

[b][color=#40FF40]0.4a[/color][/b]
- Added the ability to enable / disable cupid via Global Variable
- Fixed Bound Bow problems when the player had more arrows than the bound arrow scripted Event

[b][color=#40FF40]0.3b[/color][/b]
- Fixed glitch with hotkey being pressed simultaneously

[b][color=#40FF40]0.3a[/color][/b]
- Complete Re-write
- Support for Customed Modded Arrows (YAY)
- Special thanks to [b][color=#40FF40]memlapse[/color][/b] for helping me test this

[b][color=#40FF40]0.2a[/color][/b]
- Fixed bugs 
- Forsworn Arrow is now included
- Auto Equips your best arrow that you have in your inventory based on a priority system

[b][color=#40FF40]0.1a[/color][/b]
- Initial Release

[size=4][color=#4E2A2A]%%[/color][color=#6B2323]%%[/color][color=#891C1C]%%[/color][color=#A61515]%%[/color][color=#C40E0E]%%[/color][color=#E10707]%%[/color][color=#FF0000]%%[/color][/size]  [size=4][color=#AFEEEE][[/color] DESCRIPTION [color=#AFEEEE]][/color][/size]
OK, Cupid is a complete re-write from scratch actually. Took me most of the day to get this finished
It now supports custom arrows from other mods. So how does this actually work? It will pick the stack
of arrows that has the highest count and auto-matically equip them. If you do not have a bow present
it will auto unequip your arrows.

Why the name Cupid? Well it was released in the month of Feburary and close to the 14th and has
to deal with arrows :P

[size=4]DISABLE[/size] [color=#FF0000]->[/color] Cupid will no longer auto-unequip arrows when you no longer have a bow present, the quiver will stay there ex: if sword is out
[size=4]ENABLE[/size] [color=#FF0000]->[/color] Cupid auto equips / unequips arrows when a bow is not present / present (reason for the mod lol)
[size=4]DEFAULT[/size] [color=#FF0000]->[/color] Will allow you to use the default way skyrim will equip your arrows when you equip your bow, cupid will still proceed to unequip your arrows if you no longer have a bow out
[size=4]STACK-COUNT[/size] [color=#FF0000]->[/color] Uses the highest count of arrows that is equipped when you have a bow present

<must update documentation, out of date>

[size=4][color=#4E2A2A]%%[/color][color=#6B2323]%%[/color][color=#891C1C]%%[/color][color=#A61515]%%[/color][color=#C40E0E]%%[/color][color=#E10707]%%[/color][color=#FF0000]%%[/color][/size]  [size=4][color=#AFEEEE][[/color] INSTALL [color=#AFEEEE]][/color][/size]
[size=2][color=red]NOTE[/color][/size] - [b]If you were using a previous version before 0.3a please revert back to a saved game that did not have CUPID before installing 0.3a[/b]

Remeber to always back up your saves before installing any .ESP plugin
Place the ESP / BSA into your [b]Skyrim/Data[/b] folder

[size=4][color=#4E2A2A]%%[/color][color=#6B2323]%%[/color][color=#891C1C]%%[/color][color=#A61515]%%[/color][color=#C40E0E]%%[/color][color=#E10707]%%[/color][color=#FF0000]%%[/color][/size]  [size=4][color=#AFEEEE][[/color] FUTURE DEVELOPMENTS [color=#AFEEEE]][/color][/size]
<more to come>

[size=4][color=#4E2A2A]%%[/color][color=#6B2323]%%[/color][color=#891C1C]%%[/color][color=#A61515]%%[/color][color=#C40E0E]%%[/color][color=#E10707]%%[/color][color=#FF0000]%%[/color][/size]  [size=4][color=#AFEEEE][[/color] CONFLICTS [color=#AFEEEE]][/color][/size]
[size=2][color=red]NOTE[/color][/size] - [b]Arcane Assassin 0.9a will no longer have this feature, so you will need CUPID[/b]

[size=2][color=red]NOTE[/color][/size] - [b]The Below information is old, and will be removed once Arcane Assassin 0.9a is released[/b]
If you are using the mod of mine called \"Arcane Assassin\" then you do not need to use this mod 
as it already has the abilityto remove your arrows if you are no longer using a bow equipped
